content: Do not deviate from the plan - if deviations needed, STOP and ask user
Add General error variant to BrpMcpError and update categorize_error fallback
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding General variant
Add specialized error builders (brp_request_failed, validation_failed)
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding specialized builders
Convert brp_client.rs to use BrpMcpError instead of direct internal_error
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after brp_client.rs conversion
Convert brp_status.rs to use BrpMcpError builders instead of McpError::invalid_params
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after brp_status.rs conversion
Convert watch_response.rs to use error builders instead of format! patterns
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after watch_response.rs conversion
Convert read_log.rs to use error builders instead of string formatting
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after read_log.rs conversion
Search for and convert any remaining direct McpError or format! error patterns
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after remaining conversions
Run cargo clippy with strict settings and fix all issues
Fix any clippy issues found
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If test issues found, STOP and review with user
Task subagent for code review focusing on duplication and complexity
Review subagent suggestions with user before proceeding
